      19   custom_limb::custom_limb(  std::shared_ptr<i_endpoint> extremity,   std::shared_ptr<i_endpoint> fixed_end )
           {
           fixed_end_ = fixed_end;
           extremity_ = extremity;
          
           if (  extremity == nullptr )
           {
           throw std::invalid_argument(  "Extremity end must not be null." );
           }
           }
          
      30   custom_limb::~custom_limb(   )
           {
           }
          
      34   std::shared_ptr<i_endpoint> custom_limb::get_fixed_end(   ) const
           {
           return fixed_end_;
           }
          
      39   std::shared_ptr<i_endpoint> custom_limb::get_extremity(   ) const
           {
           return extremity_;
           }
          
      44   std::string custom_limb::xml(  unsigned int indent,   std::string namesp ) const
           {
           std::stringstream indent_stream;
          
           for (  unsigned int i = 0; i < indent; i++ )
           {
           indent_stream << "\t";
           }
          
           std::string ns = namesp;
           if (  ns.size(   ) > 0 && ns.at(  ns.size(   ) - 1 ) != ':' )
           {
           ns.push_back(  ':' );
           }
          
           std::stringstream sstr;
          
           //print definition
           sstr << indent_stream.str(   ) << "<" << ns << "limb>" << std::endl;
          
           //custom
           sstr << indent_stream.str(   ) << "\t" << "<" << ns << "custom>" << std::endl;
          
           //print extremity
           sstr << extremity_->xml(  indent + 2,   namesp );
          
           if (  fixed_end_ != nullptr )
           {
           //print fixed_end_
           sstr << fixed_end_->xml(  indent + 2,   namesp );
           }
          
           sstr << indent_stream.str(   ) << "\t" << "</" << ns << "custom>" << std::endl;
          
           sstr << indent_stream.str(   ) << "</" << ns << "limb>" << std::endl;
          
           return sstr.str(   );
           }
          
      83   bool custom_limb::equals(  std::shared_ptr<i_limb> a ) const
           {
           if (  std::shared_ptr<custom_limb> a_casted = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<custom_limb>(  a ) )
           {
           if (  extremity_->equals(  a_casted->get_extremity(   ) ) )
           {
           return (  fixed_end_ == nullptr && a_casted->get_fixed_end(   ) == nullptr )
           || (  fixed_end_ != nullptr
           && fixed_end_->equals(  a_casted->get_extremity(   )->get_fixed_end(   ) ) )
           || (  a_casted->get_fixed_end(   ) != nullptr
           && a_casted->get_fixed_end(   )->equals(  extremity_->get_fixed_end(   ) ) );
           }
           }
          
           return false;
           }
          
     100   bool custom_limb::equals(  std::shared_ptr<i_part> a ) const
           {
           if (  std::shared_ptr<i_limb> a_casted = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<i_limb>(  a ) )
           {
           return equals(  a_casted );
           }
          
           return false;
           }
          
           } // namespace ps
           } // namespace laban
           } // namespace fl
          } // namespace mae

../src/mae/fl/laban/ps/custom_limb.hpp

       1  /*
           * custom_limb.hpp
           *
           * Created on: 10.07.2014
           * Author: keks
           */
          
          #ifndef CUSTOM_LIMB_HPP_
          #define CUSTOM_LIMB_HPP_
          
          //eclipse indexer fix
          #include "../../../indexer_fix.hpp"
          
          //custom includes
          #include "i_limb.hpp"
          #include "i_endpoint.hpp"
          
          //global includes
          #include <string>
          #include <sstream>
          #include <memory>
          #include <stdexcept>
          
          namespace mae
          {
           namespace fl
           {
           namespace laban
           {
           namespace ps
           {
          
      33   class custom_limb: public i_limb
           {
           public:
           /**
           * Creates a custom limb pre-sign which is defined as the limb between two endpoints.
           *
           * @param fixed_end The fixed end of the limb.
           * @param extremity (  optional ) The extremity end of the limb.
           */
      42   custom_limb(  std::shared_ptr<i_endpoint> extremity,   std::shared_ptr<i_endpoint> fixed_end = nullptr );
      43   virtual ~custom_limb(   );
          
           /**
           * Returns the fixed end of the limb.
           *
           * @return
           */
      50   std::shared_ptr<i_endpoint> get_fixed_end(   ) const;
          
           /**
           * Returns the extremity end of the limb if set. Returns null otherwise.
           *
           * @return
           */
      57   std::shared_ptr<i_endpoint> get_extremity(   ) const;
          
           /**
           * Returns the XML representation for this element.
           *
           * @param indent The applied indent.
           * @param namesp The prefixed XML namespace.
           *
           * @return The XML string.
           */
      67   virtual std::string xml(  unsigned int indent = 0,   std::string namesp = "" ) const;
          
           /**
           * Returns true if elements are equal.
           *
           * @param a The element to be compared to.
           * @return True if equal.
           */
      75   virtual bool equals(  std::shared_ptr<i_part> a ) const;
          
           /**
           * Returns true if elements are equal.
           *
           * @param a The element to be compared to.
           * @return True if equal.
           */
      83   virtual bool equals(  std::shared_ptr<i_limb> a ) const;
          
           private:
      86   std::shared_ptr<i_endpoint> fixed_end_;
      87   std::shared_ptr<i_endpoint> extremity_;
           };
          
           } // namespace ps
           } // namespace laban
           } // namespace fl
          } // namespace mae
          
          #endif // CUSTOM_LIMB_HPP_

../src/mae/fl/laban/ps/default_limb.cpp

       1  /*
           * default_limb.cpp
           *
           * Created on: 10.07.2014
           * Author: keks
           */
          
          #include "default_limb.hpp"
          
          namespace mae
          {
           namespace fl
           {
           namespace laban
           {
           namespace ps
           {
          
      19   default_limb::default_limb(  e_limb limb )
           {
           limb_ = limb;
          
           if (  limb_ == e_limb::NONE )
           {
           throw std::invalid_argument(  "NONE is not allowed for a default limb." );
           }
           }
          
      29   default_limb::~default_limb(   )
           {
           }
          
      33   e_limb default_limb::get_limb(   ) const
           {
           return limb_;
           }
          
      38   std::string default_limb::xml(  unsigned int indent,   std::string namesp ) const
           {
           std::stringstream indent_stream;
          
           for (  unsigned int i = 0; i < indent; i++ )
           {
           indent_stream << "\t";
           }
          
           std::string ns = namesp;
           if (  ns.size(   ) > 0 && ns.at(  ns.size(   )-1 ) != ':' )
           {
           ns.push_back(  ':' );
           }
          
           std::stringstream sstr;
          
           //print definition
           sstr << indent_stream.str(   ) << "<" << ns << "limb>" << std::endl;
          
           //default
           sstr << indent_stream.str(   ) << "\t" << "<" << ns << "default>" << std::endl;
          
           //print limb
           sstr << indent_stream.str(   ) << "\t\t" << "<" << ns << "limb>" << e_limb_c::str(  limb_ ) << "</" << ns << "limb>"
           << std::endl;
          
           sstr << indent_stream.str(   ) << "\t" << "</" << ns << "default>" << std::endl;
          
           sstr << indent_stream.str(   ) << "</" << ns << "limb>" << std::endl;
          
           return sstr.str(   );
           }
          
      72   bool default_limb::equals(  std::shared_ptr<i_limb> a ) const
           {
           if (  std::shared_ptr<default_limb> a_casted = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<default_limb>(  a ) )
           {
           return (  limb_ == a_casted->get_limb(   ) );
           }
          
           return false;
           }
          
      82   bool default_limb::equals(  std::shared_ptr<i_part> a ) const
           {
           if (  std::shared_ptr<i_limb> a_casted = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<i_limb>(  a ) )
           {
           return equals(  a_casted );
           }
          
           return false;
           }
          
           } // namespace ps
           } // namespace laban
           } // namespace fl
          } // namespace mae

../src/mae/fl/laban/ps/default_limb.hpp

       1  /*
           * default_limb.hpp
           *
           * Created on: 10.07.2014
           * Author: keks
           */
          
          #ifndef DEFAULT_LIMB_HPP_
          #define DEFAULT_LIMB_HPP_
          
          //eclipse indexer fix
          #include "../../../indexer_fix.hpp"
          
          //custom includes
          #include "i_limb.hpp"
          #include "e_limb.hpp"
          
          //global includes
          #include <string>
          #include <sstream>
          #include <stdexcept>
          #include <memory>
          
          
          namespace mae
          {
           namespace fl
           {
           namespace laban
           {
           namespace ps
           {
          
      34   class default_limb: public i_limb
           {
           public:
           /**
           * Creates a default limb pre-sign which uses one of the defined limbs.
           *
           * @param limb The limb type.
           */
      42   default_limb(  e_limb limb );
      43   virtual ~default_limb(   );
          
           /**
           * Returns the limb type.
           *
           * @return
           */
      50   e_limb get_limb(   ) const;
          
           /**
           * Returns the XML representation for this element.
           *
           * @param indent The applied indent.
           * @param namesp The prefixed XML namespace.
           *
           * @return The XML string.
           */
      60   virtual std::string xml(  unsigned int indent = 0,   std::string namesp = "" ) const;
          
           /**
           * Returns true if elements are equal.
           *
           * @param a The element to be compared to.
           * @return True if equal.
           */
      68   virtual bool equals(  std::shared_ptr<i_part> a ) const;
          
           /**
           * Returns true if elements are equal.
           *
           * @param a The element to be compared to.
           * @return True if equal.
           */
      76   virtual bool equals(  std::shared_ptr<i_limb> a ) const;
          
           private:
      79   e_limb limb_;
           };
          
           } // namespace ps
           } // namespace laban
           } // namespace fl
          } // namespace mae
          
          #endif // DEFAULT_LIMB_HPP_

../src/mae/fl/laban/ps/digit_part.cpp

       1  /*
           * digit_part.cpp
           *
           * Created on: 10.07.2014
           * Author: keks
           */
          
          #include "digit_part.hpp"
          
          namespace mae
          {
           namespace fl
           {
           namespace laban
           {
           namespace ps
           {
          
      19   digit_part::digit_part(  e_digit digit,   unsigned int knuckle )
           {
           digit_ = digit;
           knuckle_ = knuckle;
          
           if (  digit == e_digit::INDEXFINGER || digit == e_digit::LITTLEFINGER
           || digit == e_digit::MIDDLEFINGER || digit == e_digit::RINGFINGER
           || digit == e_digit::THUMB )
           {
           if (  knuckle > 4 )
           {
           throw std::invalid_argument(  
           "Knuckle must not be greater than 4 since a finger is addressed." );
           }
           }
           else if (  digit == e_digit::NONE )
           {
           throw std::invalid_argument(  "Digit is set to NONE which is invalid." );
           }
           else
           {
           if (  knuckle > 3 )
           {
           throw std::invalid_argument(  "Knuckle must not be greater than 3 since a toe is addressed." );
           }
           }
           }
          
      47   digit_part::~digit_part(   )
           {
           }
          
      51   e_digit digit_part::get_digit(   ) const
           {
           return digit_;
           }
          
      56   unsigned int digit_part::get_knuckle(   ) const
           {
           return knuckle_;
           }
          
      61   std::string digit_part::xml(  unsigned int indent,   std::string namesp ) const
           {
           std::stringstream indent_stream;
          
           for (  unsigned int i = 0; i < indent; i++ )
           {
           indent_stream << "\t";
           }
          
           std::string ns = namesp;
           if (  ns.size(   ) > 0 && ns.at(  ns.size(   )-1 ) != ':' )
           {
           ns.push_back(  ':' );
           }
          
          
           std::stringstream sstr;
          
           //print definition
           sstr << indent_stream.str(   ) << "<" << ns << "digit>" << std::endl;
          
           //print digit
           sstr << indent_stream.str(   ) << "\t" << "<" << ns << "digit>" << e_digit_c::str(  digit_ ) << "</" << ns << "digit>"
           << std::endl;
          
           //print joint
           sstr << indent_stream.str(   ) << "\t" << "<" << ns << "joint>" << knuckle_ << "</" << ns << "joint>" << std::endl;
          
           sstr << indent_stream.str(   ) << "</" << ns << "digit>" << std::endl;
          
           return sstr.str(   );
           }
          
      94   std::shared_ptr<i_endpoint> digit_part::get_fixed_end(   ) const
           {
           std::shared_ptr<i_endpoint> result;
          
           //TODO
          
           return result;
           }
          
     103   bool digit_part::equals(  std::shared_ptr<i_endpoint> a ) const
           {
           if (  std::shared_ptr<digit_part> a_casted = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<digit_part>(  a ) )
           {
           return (  digit_ == a_casted->get_digit(   ) && knuckle_ == a_casted->get_knuckle(   ) );
           }
          
           return false;
           }
          
     113   bool digit_part::equals(  std::shared_ptr<i_part> a ) const
           {
           if (  std::shared_ptr<i_endpoint> a_casted = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<i_endpoint>(  a ) )
           {
           return equals(  a_casted );
           }
          
           return false;
           }
          
           } // namespace ps
           } // namespace laban
           } // namespace fl
          } // namespace mae

../src/mae/fl/laban/ps/digit_part.hpp

       1  /*
           * digit_part.hpp
           *
           * Created on: 10.07.2014
           * Author: keks
           */
          
          #ifndef DIGIT_PART_HPP_
          #define DIGIT_PART_HPP_
          
          //eclipse indexer fix
          #include "../../../indexer_fix.hpp"
          
          //custom includes
          #include "i_endpoint.hpp"
          #include "e_digit.hpp"
          
          //global includes
          #include <string>
          #include <sstream>
          #include <stdexcept>
          #include <memory>
          
          
          namespace mae
          {
           namespace fl
           {
           namespace laban
           {
           namespace ps
           {
          
      34   class digit_part: public i_endpoint
           {
           public:
           /**
           * Creates a digit pre-sign which consist of a digit (  finger or toes ) and a knuckle.
           *
           * @param digit The addressed digit.
           * @param knuckle The addressed knuckle. Zero represents the whole digit,   whereas
           * A number represents the knuckle counted from the base. Therefore
           * 3 for toes and 4 for fingers is the maximum valid value.
           */
      45   digit_part(  e_digit digit,   unsigned int knuckle );
      46   virtual ~digit_part(   );
          
           /**
           * Returns the addressed digit.
           *
           * @return
           */
      53   e_digit get_digit(   ) const;
          
           /**
           * Returns the addressed knuckle. Zero represents the whole digit whereas a number
           * represents the knuckle counted from the base.
           *
           * @return
           */
      61   unsigned int get_knuckle(   ) const;
          
           /**
           * Returns the XML representation for this element.
           *
           * @param indent The applied indent.
           * @param namesp The prefixed XML namespace.
           *
           * @return The XML string.
           */
      71   virtual std::string xml(  unsigned int indent = 0,   std::string namesp = "" ) const;
          
           /**
           * Returns the predecessor of the current endpoint (  which is the default fixed endpoint ). If the endpoint is the beginning of the extremity null is returned.
           *
           * @return The successor element.
           */
      78   virtual std::shared_ptr<i_endpoint> get_fixed_end(   ) const;
          
           /**
           * Returns true if elements are equal.
           *
           * @param a The element to be compared to.
           * @return True if equal.
           */
      86   virtual bool equals(  std::shared_ptr<i_part> a ) const;
          
           /**
           * Returns true if elements are equal.
           *
           * @param a The element to be compared to.
           * @return True if equal.
           */
      94   virtual bool equals(  std::shared_ptr<i_endpoint> a ) const;
          
           private:
      97   e_digit digit_;
           unsigned int knuckle_;
           };
          
           } // namespace ps
           } // namespace laban
           } // namespace fl
          } // namespace mae
          
          #endif // DIGIT_PART_HPP_

../src/mae/fl/laban/ps/e_area.cpp

       1  /*
           * e_area.cpp
           *
           * Created on: 10.07.2014
           * Author: keks
           */
          
          #include "e_area.hpp"
          
          namespace mae
          {
           namespace fl
           {
           namespace laban
           {
           namespace ps
           {
      18   std::string e_area_c::str(  e_area area )
           {
           switch (  area )
           {
           case e_area::NONE : return "none";
           case e_area::HEAD : return "head";
           case e_area::CHEST : return "chest";
           case e_area::WAIST : return "waist";
           case e_area::PELVIS : return "pelvis";
           case e_area::TORSO : return "torso";
           }
          
           throw std::invalid_argument(  "Enum value not listed in the str(   ) method" );
           }
          
      33   std::vector<e_area> e_area_c::vec(   )
           {
           std::vector<e_area> result;
           result.push_back(  e_area::NONE  );
           result.push_back(  e_area::HEAD  );
           result.push_back(  e_area::CHEST  );
           result.push_back(  e_area::WAIST  );
           result.push_back(  e_area::PELVIS  );
           result.push_back(  e_area::TORSO  );
          
           return result;
           }
          
      46   e_area e_area_c::parse(  std::string str )
           {
           std::string str_l = mstr::to_lower(  str );
          
           std::vector<e_area> v = e_area_c::vec(   );
          
           for (  unsigned int i = 0; i < v.size(   ); i++ )
           {
           std::string t = e_area_c::str(  v.at(  i ) );
           if (  str_l == mstr::to_lower(  t ) )
           {
           return v.at(  i );
           }
           }
          
           throw std::invalid_argument(  "Could not parse the given value since no match was found." );
           }
          
          
           } // namespace ps
           } // namespace laban
           } // namespace fl
          } // namespace mae

../src/mae/fl/laban/ps/e_area.hpp

       1  /*
           * e_area.hpp
           *
           * Created on: 10.07.2014
           * Author: keks
           */
          
          #ifndef E_AREA_HPP_
          #define E_AREA_HPP_
          
          //eclipse indexer fix
          #include "../../../indexer_fix.hpp"
          
          //custom includes
          #include "../../../mstr.hpp"
          
          //global includes
          #include <string>
          #include <vector>
          #include <stdexcept>
          
          namespace mae
          {
           namespace fl
           {
           namespace laban
           {
           namespace ps
           {
          
      31   enum class e_area
           {
           NONE,  
           HEAD,  
           CHEST,  
           WAIST,  
           PELVIS,  
           TORSO
           };
          
      41   class e_area_c
           {
           public:
           /**
           * Returns the string representation for this enum value.
           *
           * @param area The element.
           * @return The string representation.
           */
      50   static std::string str(  e_area area );
          
           /**
           * Returns a vector containing all possible enum values.
           *
           * @return A vector.
           */
      57   static std::vector<e_area> vec(   );
          
           /**
           * Parses the string and returns the corresponding element.
           *
           * @param str The string to be parsed.
           * @return The element.
           */
      65   static e_area parse(  std::string str );
           };
          
           } // namespace ps
           } // namespace laban
           } // namespace fl
          } // namespace mae
          
          #endif // E_AREA_HPP_

../src/mae/fl/laban/ps/e_digit.cpp

       1  /*
           * e_digit.cpp
           *
           * Created on: 10.07.2014
           * Author: keks
           */
          
          #include "e_digit.hpp"
          
          namespace mae
          {
           namespace fl
           {
           namespace laban
           {
           namespace ps
           {
          
      19   std::string e_digit_c::str(  e_digit digit )
           {
           switch (  digit )
           {
           case e_digit::NONE : return "none";
           case e_digit::THUMB : return "thumb";
           case e_digit::INDEXFINGER : return "indexFinger";
           case e_digit::MIDDLEFINGER : return "middleFinger";
           case e_digit::RINGFINGER : return "ringFinger";
           case e_digit::LITTLEFINGER : return "littleFinger";
           case e_digit::BIGTOE : return "bigToe";
           case e_digit::LONGTOE : return "longToe";
           case e_digit::MIDDLETOE : return "middleToe";
           case e_digit::RINGTOE : return "ringToe";
           case e_digit::LITTLETOE : return "littleToe";
           }
          
           throw std::invalid_argument(  "Enum value not listed in the str(   ) method" );
           }
          
      39   std::vector<e_digit> e_digit_c::vec(   )
           {
           std::vector<e_digit> result;
           result.push_back(  e_digit::NONE  );
           result.push_back(  e_digit::THUMB  );
           result.push_back(  e_digit::INDEXFINGER  );
           result.push_back(  e_digit::MIDDLEFINGER  );
           result.push_back(  e_digit::RINGFINGER  );
           result.push_back(  e_digit::LITTLEFINGER  );
           result.push_back(  e_digit::BIGTOE  );
           result.push_back(  e_digit::LONGTOE  );
           result.push_back(  e_digit::MIDDLETOE  );
           result.push_back(  e_digit::RINGTOE  );
           result.push_back(  e_digit::LITTLETOE  );
          
           return result;
           }
          
      57   e_digit e_digit_c::parse(  std::string str )
           {
           std::string str_l = mstr::to_lower(  str );
          
           std::vector<e_digit> v = e_digit_c::vec(   );
          
           for (  unsigned int i = 0; i < v.size(   ); i++ )
           {
           std::string t = e_digit_c::str(  v.at(  i ) );
           if (  str_l == mstr::to_lower(  t ) )
           {
           return v.at(  i );
           }
           }
          
           throw std::invalid_argument(  "Could not parse the given value since no match was found." );
           }
          
          
           } // namespace ps
           } // namespace laban
           } // namespace fl
          } // namespace mae

../src/mae/fl/laban/ps/e_digit.hpp

          #ifndef E_DIGIT_HPP_
          #define E_DIGIT_HPP_
          
          //eclipse indexer fix
          #include "../../../indexer_fix.hpp"
          
          //custom includes
          #include "../../../mstr.hpp"
          
          //global includes
          #include <string>
          #include <stdexcept>
          #include <vector>
          
          namespace mae
          {
           namespace fl
           {
           namespace laban
           {
           namespace ps
           {
          
      31   enum class e_digit
           {
           NONE,  
           THUMB,  
           INDEXFINGER,  
           MIDDLEFINGER,  
           RINGFINGER,  
           LITTLEFINGER,  
           BIGTOE,  
           LONGTOE,  
           MIDDLETOE,  
           RINGTOE,  
           LITTLETOE
           };
          
      46   class e_digit_c
           {
           public:
           /**
           * Returns the string representation for this enum value.
           *
           * @param digit The element.
           * @return The string representation.
           */
      55   static std::string str(  e_digit digit );
          
           /**
           * Returns a vector containing all possible enum values.
           *
           * @return A vector.
           */
      62   static std::vector<e_digit> vec(   );
          
           /**
           * Parses the string and returns the corresponding element.
           *
           * @param str The string to be parsed.
           * @return The element.
           */
      70   static e_digit parse(  std::string str );
           };

../src/mae/fl/laban/ps/e_joint.cpp

       1  /*
           * e_joint.cpp
           *
           * Created on: 10.07.2014
           * Author: keks
           */
          
          #include "e_joint.hpp"
          
          namespace mae
          {
           namespace fl
           {
           namespace laban
           {
           namespace ps
           {
          
      19   std::string e_joint_c::str(  e_joint joint_ )
           {
           switch (  joint_ )
           {
           case e_joint::NONE : return "none";
           case e_joint::SHOULDER : return "shoulder";
           case e_joint::ELBOW : return "elbow";
           case e_joint::WRIST : return "wrist";
           case e_joint::HAND : return "hand";
           case e_joint::FINGERS : return "fingers";
           case e_joint::HIP : return "hip";
           case e_joint::KNEE : return "knee";
           case e_joint::ANKLE : return "ankle";
           case e_joint::FOOT : return "foot";
           case e_joint::TOES : return "toes";
           }
          
           throw std::invalid_argument(  "Enum value not listed in the str(   ) method" );
           }
          
      39   std::vector<e_joint> e_joint_c::vec(   )
           {
           std::vector<e_joint> result;
           result.push_back(  e_joint::NONE  );
           result.push_back(  e_joint::SHOULDER  );
           result.push_back(  e_joint::ELBOW  );
           result.push_back(  e_joint::WRIST  );
           result.push_back(  e_joint::HAND  );
           result.push_back(  e_joint::FINGERS  );
           result.push_back(  e_joint::HIP  );
           result.push_back(  e_joint::KNEE  );
           result.push_back(  e_joint::ANKLE  );
           result.push_back(  e_joint::FOOT  );
           result.push_back(  e_joint::TOES  );
          
           return result;
           }
          
      57   e_joint e_joint_c::parse(  std::string str )
           {
           std::string str_l = mstr::to_lower(  str );
          
           std::vector<e_joint> v = e_joint_c::vec(   );
          
           for (  unsigned int i = 0; i < v.size(   ); i++ )
           {
           std::string t = e_joint_c::str(  v.at(  i ) );
           if (  str_l == mstr::to_lower(  t ) )
           {
           return v.at(  i );
           }
           }
          
           throw std::invalid_argument(  "Could not parse the given value since no match was found." );
           }
          
           } // namespace ps
           } // namespace laban
           } // namespace fl
          } // namespace mae

../src/mae/fl/laban/ps/e_joint.hpp

          #include "../../../mstr.hpp"

          #include <vector>

          {
           namespace fl
           {
           namespace laban
           {
           namespace ps
           {
          
      31   enum class e_joint
           {
           NONE,  
           SHOULDER,  
           ELBOW,  
           WRIST,  
           HAND,  
           FINGERS,  
           HIP,  
           KNEE,  
           ANKLE,  
           FOOT,  
           TOES
           };
          
      46   class e_joint_c
           {
           public:
           /**
           * Returns the string representation for this enum value.
           *
           * @param joint The element.
           * @return The string representation.
           */
      55   static std::string str(  e_joint joint );

           * Returns a vector containing all possible enum values.
           *
           * @return A vector.
           */
      62   static std::vector<e_joint> vec(   );

           * Parses the string and returns the corresponding element.
           *
           * @param str The string to be parsed.
           * @return The element.
           */

           };

../src/mae/fl/laban/ps/e_limb.cpp

       1  /*
           * e_limb.cpp
           *
           * Created on: 10.07.2014
           * Author: keks
           */
          
          #include "e_limb.hpp"
          
          namespace mae
          {
           namespace fl
           {
           namespace laban
           {
           namespace ps
           {
      18   std::string e_limb_c::str(  e_limb limb )
           {
           switch (  limb )
           {
           case e_limb::NONE : return "none";
           case e_limb::ARM : return "arm";
           case e_limb::LEG : return "leg";
           case e_limb::NECK : return "neck";
           case e_limb::UPPER_ARM : return "upper_arm";
           case e_limb::LOWER_ARM : return "lower_arm";
           case e_limb::THIGH : return "thigh";
           case e_limb::LOWER_LEG : return "lower_leg";
           }
          
           throw std::invalid_argument(  "Enum value not listed in the str(   ) method" );
           }
          
      35   std::vector<e_limb> e_limb_c::vec(   )
           {
           std::vector<e_limb> result;
           result.push_back(  e_limb::NONE  );
           result.push_back(  e_limb::ARM  );
           result.push_back(  e_limb::LEG  );
           result.push_back(  e_limb::NECK  );
           result.push_back(  e_limb::UPPER_ARM  );
           result.push_back(  e_limb::LOWER_ARM  );
           result.push_back(  e_limb::THIGH  );
           result.push_back(  e_limb::LOWER_LEG  );
          
           return result;
           }
          
      50   e_limb e_limb_c::parse(  std::string str )
           {
           std::string str_l = mstr::to_lower(  str );
          
           std::vector<e_limb> v = e_limb_c::vec(   );
          
           for (  unsigned int i = 0; i < v.size(   ); i++ )
           {
           std::string t = e_limb_c::str(  v.at(  i ) );
           if (  str_l == mstr::to_lower(  t ) )
           {
           return v.at(  i );
           }
           }
          
           throw std::invalid_argument(  "Could not parse the given value since no match was found." );
           }
          
          
           } // namespace ps
           } // namespace laban
           } // namespace fl
          } // namespace mae

../src/mae/fl/laban/ps/e_limb.hpp

       1  /*
           * e_limb.hpp

           * Created on: 10.07.2014

           */
          
          #ifndef E_LIMB_HPP_
          #define E_LIMB_HPP_
          
          //eclipse indexer fix
          #include "../../../indexer_fix.hpp"
          
          //custom includes
          #include "../../../mstr.hpp"
          
          //global includes
          #include <string>
          #include <stdexcept>
          #include <vector>
          
          namespace mae
          {
           namespace fl
           {
           namespace laban
           {
           namespace ps
           {
      30   enum class e_limb
           {
           NONE,  
           ARM,  
           LEG,  
           NECK,  
           UPPER_ARM,  
           LOWER_ARM,  
           THIGH,  
           LOWER_LEG
           };
          
          
      43   class e_limb_c
           {
           public:
           /**
           * Returns the string representation for this enum value.
           *
           * @param limb The element.
           * @return The string representation.
           */
      52   static std::string str(  e_limb limb );
          
           /**
           * Returns a vector containing all possible enum values.
           *
           * @return A vector.
           */
      59   static std::vector<e_limb> vec(   );
          
           /**
           * Parses the string and returns the corresponding element.
           *
           * @param str The string to be parsed.
           * @return The element.
           */
      67   static e_limb parse(  std::string str );
           };
          
           } // namespace ps
           } // namespace laban
           } // namespace fl
          } // namespace mae
          
          #endif // E_LIMB_HPP_

../src/mae/fl/laban/ps/e_limb_side.cpp

       1  /*
           * e_limb_side.cpp
           *
           * Created on: 10.07.2014
           * Author: keks
           */
          
          #include "e_limb_side.hpp"
          
          namespace mae
          {
           namespace fl
           {
           namespace laban
           {
           namespace ps
           {
      18   std::string e_limb_side_c::str(  e_limb_side lside )
           {
           switch (  lside )
           {
           case e_limb_side::NONE : return "none";
           case e_limb_side::INNER : return "inner";
           case e_limb_side::OUTER : return "outer";
           case e_limb_side::LITTLEFINGER : return "littleFinger";
           case e_limb_side::THUMB : return "thumb";
           case e_limb_side::OUTERLITTLEFINGER : return "outer-littleFinger";
           case e_limb_side::INNERLITTLEFINGER : return "inner-littleFinger";
           case e_limb_side::OUTERTHUMB : return "outer-thumb";
           case e_limb_side::INNERTHUMB : return "inner-thumb";
           }
          
           throw std::invalid_argument(  "Enum value not listed in the str(   ) method" );
           }
          
          
      37   std::vector<e_limb_side> e_limb_side_c::vec(   )
           {
           std::vector<e_limb_side> result;
           result.push_back(  e_limb_side::NONE  );
           result.push_back(  e_limb_side::INNER  );
           result.push_back(  e_limb_side::OUTER  );
           result.push_back(  e_limb_side::LITTLEFINGER  );
           result.push_back(  e_limb_side::THUMB  );
           result.push_back(  e_limb_side::OUTERLITTLEFINGER );
           result.push_back(  e_limb_side::INNERLITTLEFINGER );
           result.push_back(  e_limb_side::OUTERTHUMB  );
           result.push_back(  e_limb_side::INNERTHUMB  );
           return result;
           }
          
      52   e_limb_side e_limb_side_c::parse(  std::string str )
           {
           std::string str_l = mstr::to_lower(  str );
          
           std::vector<e_limb_side> v = e_limb_side_c::vec(   );
          
           for (  unsigned int i = 0; i < v.size(   ); i++ )
           {
           std::string t = e_limb_side_c::str(  v.at(  i ) );
           if (  str_l == mstr::to_lower(  t ) )
           {
           return v.at(  i );
           }
           }
          
           throw std::invalid_argument(  "Could not parse the given value since no match was found." );
           }
          
          
           } // namespace ps
           } // namespace laban
           } // namespace fl
          } // namespace mae

../src/mae/fl/laban/ps/e_limb_side.hpp

       1  /*
           * e_limb_side.h
           *
           * Created on: 10.07.2014
           * Author: keks
           */
          
          #ifndef E_LIMB_SIDE_H_
          #define E_LIMB_SIDE_H_
          
          //eclipse indexer fix
          #include "../../../indexer_fix.hpp"
          
          //custom includes
          #include "../../../mstr.hpp"
          
          //global includes
          #include <string>
          #include <stdexcept>
          #include <vector>
          
          namespace mae
          {
           namespace fl
           {
           namespace laban
           {
           namespace ps
           {
          
      31   enum class e_limb_side{
           NONE,  
           INNER,  
           OUTER,  
           LITTLEFINGER,  
           THUMB,  
           OUTERLITTLEFINGER,  
           INNERLITTLEFINGER,  
           OUTERTHUMB,  
           INNERTHUMB
           };
          
      43   class e_limb_side_c
           {
           public:
           /**
           * Returns the string representation for this enum value.
           *
           * @param lside The element.
           * @return The string representation.
           */
      52   static std::string str(  e_limb_side lside );
          
           /**
           * Returns a vector containing all possible enum values.
           *
           * @return A vector.
           */
      59   static std::vector<e_limb_side> vec(   );
          
           /**
           * Parses the string and returns the corresponding element.
           *
           * @param str The string to be parsed.
           * @return The element.
           */
      67   static e_limb_side parse(  std::string str );
           };
          
           } // namespace ps
           } // namespace laban
           } // namespace fl
          } // namespace mae
          
          #endif // E_LIMB_SIDE_H_

../src/mae/fl/laban/ps/e_side.cpp

       1  /*
           * e_side.cpp
           *
           * Created on: 10.07.2014
           * Author: keks
           */
          
          #include "e_side.hpp"
          
          namespace mae
          {
           namespace fl
           {
           namespace laban
           {
           namespace ps
           {
          
      19   std::string e_side_c::str(  e_side e_side_ )
           {
           switch (  e_side_ )
           {
           case e_side::NONE:
           return "none";
           case e_side::LEFT:
           return "left";
           case e_side::RIGHT:
           return "right";
           }
          
           throw std::invalid_argument(  "Enum value not listed in the str(   ) method" );
           }
          
      34   std::vector<e_side> e_side_c::vec(   )
           {
           std::vector<e_side> result;
           result.push_back(  e_side::NONE  );
           result.push_back(  e_side::LEFT  );
           result.push_back(  e_side::RIGHT  );
          
           return result;
           }
          
      44   e_side e_side_c::parse(  std::string str )
           {
           std::string str_l = mstr::to_lower(  str );
          
           std::vector<e_side> v = e_side_c::vec(   );
          
           for (  unsigned int i = 0; i < v.size(   ); i++ )
           {
           std::string t = e_side_c::str(  v.at(  i ) );
           if (  str_l == mstr::to_lower(  t ) )
           {
           return v.at(  i );
           }
           }
          
           throw std::invalid_argument(  "Could not parse the given value since no match was found." );
           }
          
           } // namespace ps
           } // namespace laban
           } // namespace fl
          } // namespace mae

../src/mae/fl/laban/ps/e_side.hpp

       1  /*
           * e_side.hpp
           *
           * Created on: 10.07.2014
           * Author: keks
           */
          
          #ifndef E_SIDE_HPP_
          #define E_SIDE_HPP_
          
          //eclipse indexer fix
          #include "../../../indexer_fix.hpp"
          
          //custom includes
          #include "../../../mstr.hpp"
          
          //global includes
          #include <string>
          #include <stdexcept>
          #include <vector>
          
          namespace mae
          {
           namespace fl
           {
           namespace laban
           {
           namespace ps
           {
          
      31   enum class e_side
           {
           NONE,  
           LEFT,  
           RIGHT
           };
          
      38   class e_side_c
           {
           public:
           /**
           * Returns the string representation for this enum value.
           *
           * @param side The element.
           * @return The string representation.
           */
      47   static std::string str(  e_side side );
          
           /**
           * Returns a vector containing all possible enum values.
           *
           * @return A vector.
           */
      54   static std::vector<e_side> vec(   );
          
           /**
           * Parses the string and returns the corresponding element.
           *
           * @param str The string to be parsed.
           * @return The element.
           */
      62   static e_side parse(  std::string vec );
           };
          
           } // namespace ps
           } // namespace laban
           } // namespace fl
          } // namespace mae
          
          #endif // E_SIDE_HPP_

../src/mae/fl/laban/ps/i_endpoint.hpp

       1  /*
           * i_endpoint.hpp
           *
           * Created on: 10.07.2014
           * Author: keks
           */
          
          #ifndef I_ENDPOINT_HPP_
          #define I_ENDPOINT_HPP_
          
          //eclipse indexer fix
          #include "../../../indexer_fix.hpp"
          
          //custom includes
          #include "i_part.hpp"
          
          //global includes
          #include <string>
          #include <memory>
          
          
          namespace mae
          {
           namespace fl
           {
           namespace laban
           {
           namespace ps
           {
          
      31   class i_endpoint: public i_part
           {
           public:
      34   virtual ~i_endpoint(   ){}
          
           /**
           * Returns the XML representation for this element.
           *
           * @param indent The applied indent.
           * @param namesp The prefixed XML namespace.
           *
           * @return The XML string.
           */
      44   virtual std::string xml(  unsigned int indent = 0,   std::string namesp = "" ) const = 0;
          
           /**
           * Returns the predecessor of the current endpoint (  which is the default fixed endpoint ). If the endpoint is the beginning of the extremity null is returned.
           *
           * @return The successor element.
           */
      51   virtual std::shared_ptr<i_endpoint> get_fixed_end(   ) const = 0;
          
           /**
           * Returns true if elements are equal.
           *
           * @param a The element to be compared to.
           * @return True if equal.
           */
      59   virtual bool equals(  std::shared_ptr<i_part> a ) const = 0;
          
           /**
           * Returns true if elements are equal.
           *
           * @param a The element to be compared to.
           * @return True if equal.
           */
      67   virtual bool equals(  std::shared_ptr<i_endpoint> a ) const = 0;
           };
          
           } // namespace ps
           } // namespace laban
           } // namespace fl
          } // namespace mae
          
          #endif // I_ENDPOINT_HPP_

../src/mae/fl/laban/ps/joint_part.cpp

       1  /*
           * joint_part.cpp
           *
           * Created on: 10.07.2014
           * Author: keks
           */
          
          #include "joint_part.hpp"
          
          namespace mae
          {
           namespace fl
           {
           namespace laban
           {
           namespace ps
           {
          
      19   joint_part::joint_part(  e_joint joint )
           {
           joint_ = joint;
           }
          
      24   joint_part::~joint_part(   )
           {
           }
          
      28   e_joint joint_part::get_joint(   ) const
           {
           return joint_;
           }
          
      33   std::string joint_part::xml(  unsigned int indent,   std::string namesp ) const
           {
           std::stringstream indent_stream;
          
           for (  unsigned int i = 0; i < indent; i++ )
           {
           indent_stream << "\t";
           }
          
           std::string ns = namesp;
           if (  ns.size(   ) > 0 && ns.at(  ns.size(   )-1 ) != ':' )
           {
           ns.push_back(  ':' );
           }
          
           std::stringstream sstr;
          
           //print definition
           sstr << indent_stream.str(   ) << "<" << ns << "joint>" << std::endl;
          
           //print joint
           sstr << indent_stream.str(   ) << "\t" << "<" << ns << "joint>" << e_joint_c::str(  joint_ ) << "</" << ns << "joint>" << std::endl;
          
           sstr << indent_stream.str(   ) << "</" << ns << "joint>" << std::endl;
          
           return sstr.str(   );
           }
          
      61   bool joint_part::equals(  std::shared_ptr<i_endpoint> a ) const
           {
           if (  std::shared_ptr<joint_part> a_casted = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<joint_part>(  a ) )
           {
           return (  joint_ == a_casted->get_joint(   ) );
           }
          
           return false;
           }
          
      71   bool joint_part::equals(  std::shared_ptr<i_part> a ) const
           {
           if (  std::shared_ptr<i_endpoint> a_casted = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<i_endpoint>(  a ) )
           {
           return equals(  a_casted );
           }
          
           return false;
           }
          
      81   std::shared_ptr<i_endpoint> joint_part::get_fixed_end(   ) const
           {
           std::shared_ptr<i_endpoint> result;
          
           //TODO
          
           return result;
           }
          
           } // namespace ps
           } // namespace laban
           } // namespace fl
          } // namespace mae

../src/mae/fl/laban/ps/joint_part.hpp

       1  /*
           * joint_part.hpp
           *
           * Created on: 10.07.2014
           * Author: keks
           */
          
          #ifndef JOINT_PART_HPP_
          #define JOINT_PART_HPP_
          
          //eclipse indexer fix
          #include "../../../indexer_fix.hpp"
          
          //custom includes
          #include "i_endpoint.hpp"
          #include "e_joint.hpp"
          
          //global includes
          #include <string>
          #include <sstream>
          #include <stdexcept>
          #include <memory>
          
          
          namespace mae
          {
           namespace fl
           {
           namespace laban
           {
           namespace ps
           {
          
      34   class joint_part: public i_endpoint
           {
           public:
           /**
           * Creates a joint part used for a pre-sign.
           *
           * @param joint The addressed joint.
           */
      42   joint_part(  e_joint joint );
      43   virtual ~joint_part(   );
          
           /**
           * Returns the addressed joint.
           * @return
           */
      49   e_joint get_joint(   ) const;
          
           /**
           * Returns the XML representation for this element.
           *
           * @param indent The applied indent.
           * @param namesp The prefixed XML namespace.
           *
           * @return The XML string.
           */
      59   virtual std::string xml(  unsigned int indent = 0,   std::string namesp = "" ) const;
          
           /**
           * Returns the predecessor of the current endpoint (  which is the default fixed endpoint ). If the endpoint is the beginning of the extremity null is returned.
           *
           * @return The successor element.
           */
      66   virtual std::shared_ptr<i_endpoint> get_fixed_end(   ) const;
          
           /**
           * Returns true if elements are equal.
           *
           * @param a The element to be compared to.
           * @return True if equal.
           */
      74   virtual bool equals(  std::shared_ptr<i_part> a ) const;
          
           /**
           * Returns true if elements are equal.
           *
           * @param a The element to be compared to.
           * @return True if equal.
           */
      82   virtual bool equals(  std::shared_ptr<i_endpoint> a ) const;
          
           private:
      85   e_joint joint_;
           };
          
           } // namespace ps
           } // namespace laban
           } // namespace fl
          } // namespace mae
          
          #endif // JOINT_PART_HPP_

../src/mae/fl/laban/ps/prop.cpp

       1  /*
           * prop.cpp
           *
           * Created on: 10.07.2014
           * Author: keks
           */
          
          #include "prop.hpp"
          
          
          namespace mae
          {
           namespace fl
           {
           namespace laban
           {
           namespace ps
           {
          
      20   prop::prop(  std::string name,   std::string description )
           {
           name_ = name;
           description_ = description;
          
           if (  name.size(   ) == 0 )
           {
           throw std::invalid_argument(  
           "A name must be defined." );
           }
           }
          
      32   prop::~prop(   )
           {
          
           }
          
      37   std::string prop::get_name(   ) const
           {
           return name_;
           }
          
      42   std::string prop::get_description(   ) const
           {
           return description_;
           }
          
      47   std::string prop::xml(  unsigned int indent,   std::string namesp ) const
           {
           std::stringstream indent_stream;
          
           for (  unsigned int i = 0; i < indent; i++ )
           {
           indent_stream << "\t";
           }
          
           std::string ns = namesp;
           if (  ns.size(   ) > 0 && ns.at(  ns.size(   )-1 ) != ':' )
           {
           ns.push_back(  ':' );
           }
          
           std::stringstream sstr;
          
           //print definition
           sstr << indent_stream.str(   ) << "<" << ns << "preSign>" << std::endl;
          
           sstr << indent_stream.str(   ) << "\t" << "<" << ns << "prop>" << std::endl;
           sstr << indent_stream.str(   ) << "\t\t" << "<" << ns << "name>" << name_ << "</" << ns << "name>" << std::endl;
           if (  description_.size(   ) > 0 )
           {
           sstr << indent_stream.str(   ) << "\t\t" << "<" << ns << "description>" << description_ << "</" << ns << "description>" << std::endl;
           }
           sstr << indent_stream.str(   ) << "\t" << "</" << ns << "prop>" << std::endl;
          
           sstr << indent_stream.str(   ) << "</" << ns << "preSign>" << std::endl;
          
           return sstr.str(   );
           }
          
      80   bool prop::equals(  std::shared_ptr<i_pre_sign> a ) const
           {
           if (  std::shared_ptr<prop> a_casted = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<prop>(  a ) )
           {
           return (  name_ == a_casted->get_name(   ) && description_ == a_casted->get_description(   ) );
           }
          
           return false;
           }
          
           } // namespace ps
           } // namespace laban
           } // namespace fl
          } // namespace mae

../src/mae/fl/laban/ps/prop.hpp

       1  /*
           * prop.hpp
           *
           * Created on: 10.07.2014
           * Author: keks
           */
          
          #ifndef PROP_HPP_
          #define PROP_HPP_
          
          //eclipse indexer fix
          #include "../../../indexer_fix.hpp"
          
          //custom includes
          #include "i_pre_sign.hpp"
          
          //global includes
          #include <string>
          #include <sstream>
          #include <stdexcept>
          
          
          namespace mae
          {
           namespace fl
           {
           namespace laban
           {
           namespace ps
           {
          
      32   class prop : public i_pre_sign
           {
           public:
           /**
           * Creates a prop pre-sign which can be used to freely define a pre-sign
           * using a name and an optional description.
           *
           * @param name The expressive name of the pre-sign.
           * @param description The optional description.
           */
      42   prop(  std::string name,   std::string description = "" );
      43   virtual ~prop(   );
          
           /**
           * Returns the name of the pre-sign.
           * @return
           */
      49   std::string get_name(   ) const;
          
           /**
           * Returns the description of the pre-sign. Returns an empty
           * string if none set.
           *
           * @return
           */
      57   std::string get_description(   ) const;
          
           /**
           * Returns the XML representation for this element.
           *
           * @param indent The applied indent.
           * @param namesp The prefixed XML namespace.
           *
           * @return The XML string.
           */
      67   virtual std::string xml(  unsigned int indent = 0,   std::string namesp = "" ) const;
          
           /**
           * Returns true if elements are equal.
           *
           * @param a The element to be compared to.
           * @return True if equal.
           */
      75   virtual bool equals(  std::shared_ptr<i_pre_sign> a ) const;
          
          
           private:
      79   std::string name_;
      80   std::string description_;
           };
          
           } // namespace ps
           } // namespace laban
           } // namespace fl
          } // namespace mae
          
          #endif // PROP_HPP_

../src/mae/fl/laban/ps/ps.hpp

           * ps.hpp
